name: Pratekk Agarwaal
about: Pratekk Agarwaal is a seasoned entrepreneur & operator , boasting over 20 years of…

people_also_viewed.name: Harpreet Singh
people_also_viewed.about: CEO @ Lexcil India Pvt Ltd | Six Sigma Black Belt I Innovator I Strategic Thinker I Board Member NGO I Angel Investor

recommendations: Ashwin Rao Mandre (AM) “Pratekk is a super human and one of my mentor too :) He’s a seasoned consultant, advisor and operator VC. He’s very quick to realise the objectives of a business or any project and the short-long term implications of the work he gets into. He brings a unique perspective in every meeting based on his extensive experience. His approach to a problem, deliverables, fund raise, growth and management are some skills which makes him unique. I was fortunate to work with Pratekk on multiple occasions and got a chance to learn a lot :) he’s someone who is very easily accessible and approachable and adds a lot of value once on board. I completely vouch for Pratekk and wish him immense growth and success!! Thanks, Ashwin ”

Uday Narayan “A ever hungry learner, profundity nurtured by execution, 360 degree experience of lending business, a risk taker, multiple startups (incl own) START UP experience.......these are few attributes of Pratekk. Has equally strong fun loving side, a must for balance approach. Best wishes Pratekk”
